mapper.select: SELECT WORK_ID, WORK_TYPE, WORK_SUMMARY, WORK_DESCRIPTION, REPORTER, CREATED, WORK_STATUS FROM WORK_ITEM WHERE WORK_ID = #{workId}
SELECT ID, WORK_OR_TASK_ID, MIMETYPE, FILENAME, CREATED, FILESIZE, AUTHOR, PATH, DOWNLOAD_PATH FROM FILE_ATTACHMENT WHERE WORK_OR_TASK_ID = #{workOrTaskId}
SELECT ID, WORK_OR_TASK_ID, AUTHOR, ACTION_TYPE, ACTION_BODY, CREATED, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATED FROM WORK_TASK_ACTION WHERE WORK_OR_TASK_ID = #{workOrTaskId} ORDER BY CREATED ASC

SELECT TASK_ID, WORK_ID, WORK_TASK_NUM, ASSIGNEE_DEPT, ASSIGNEE, ASSIST, TASK_SUMMARY, TASK_DESCRIPTION, PRIORITY, TASK_RESOLUTION, TASK_STATUS, TASK_CREATED, TASK_UPDATED, TASK_DUEDATE, TASK_RESOLUTIONDATE, REPORTER, SUPERVISOR FROM TASK_ITEM
WHERE TASK_ID= #{taskId}

SELECT TASK_ID, WORK_ID, WORK_TASK_NUM, ASSIGNEE_DEPT, ASSIGNEE, ASSIST, TASK_SUMMARY, TASK_DESCRIPTION, PRIORITY, TASK_RESOLUTION, TASK_STATUS, TASK_CREATED, TASK_UPDATED, TASK_DUEDATE, TASK_RESOLUTIONDATE, REPORTER, SUPERVISOR FROM TASK_ITEM
WHERE ASSIGNEE= #{assignee} and TASK_RESOLUTION=#{taskResolution} and ( TASK_STATUS='released' or TASK_STATUS='urging' )

SELECT TASK_ID, WORK_ID, WORK_TASK_NUM, ASSIGNEE_DEPT, ASSIGNEE, ASSIST, TASK_SUMMARY, TASK_DESCRIPTION, PRIORITY, TASK_RESOLUTION, TASK_STATUS, TASK_CREATED, TASK_UPDATED, TASK_DUEDATE, TASK_RESOLUTIONDATE, REPORTER, SUPERVISOR FROM TASK_ITEM
WHERE ASSIGNEE= #{assignee} and TASK_RESOLUTION=#{taskResolution}

SELECT TASK_ID, ASSIGNEE, TASK_SUMMARY, TASK_STATUS, TASK_CREATED, TASK_DUEDATE, ACTION_TYPE, CREATED FROM TASK_ITEM AS TB01, (SELECT ID, WORK_OR_TASK_ID, AUTHOR, ACTION_TYPE, ACTION_BODY, CREATED, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATED FROM WORK_TASK_ACTION AS TBOUT WHERE TBOUT.CREATED = (SELECT MAX(TBIN.CREATED) FROM WORK_TASK_ACTION AS TBIN WHERE TBIN.WORK_OR_TASK_ID = TBOUT.WORK_OR_TASK_ID)) AS TB02 WHERE TB01.ASSIGNEE = #{assignee} AND TB01.TASK_RESOLUTION = #{taskResolution} AND TB01.TASK_ID = TB02.WORK_OR_TASK_ID AND ( TB01.TASK_STATUS = 'communicationprogress' OR TB01.TASK_STATUS = 'applyforadjustment' OR TB01.TASK_STATUS = 'applyforcompleted' OR TB01.TASK_STATUS = 'completechanges')

SELECT TASK_ID, ASSIGNEE, TASK_SUMMARY, TASK_STATUS, TASK_CREATED, TASK_DUEDATE, ACTION_TYPE, CREATED FROM TASK_ITEM AS TB01, (SELECT ID, WORK_OR_TASK_ID, AUTHOR, ACTION_TYPE, ACTION_BODY, CREATED, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATED FROM WORK_TASK_ACTION AS TBOUT WHERE TBOUT.CREATED = (SELECT MAX(TBIN.CREATED) FROM WORK_TASK_ACTION AS TBIN WHERE TBIN.WORK_OR_TASK_ID = TBOUT.WORK_OR_TASK_ID)) AS TB02 WHERE TB01.TASK_ID = #{taskId} AND TB01.TASK_ID = TB02.WORK_OR_TASK_ID

SELECT ASSIGNEE, sum(CASE WHEN TASK_DUEDATE < NOW() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'overdue', sum( CASE WHEN now() > DATE_SUB(TASK_DUEDATE, INTERVAL 2 DAY) AND NOW() < TASK_DUEDATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'comingsoon', sum( CASE WHEN now() < DATE_SUB(TASK_DUEDATE, INTERVAL 2 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'notoverdue' FROM task_item WHERE TASK_RESOLUTION = 'open' and ASSIGNEE = #{assignee} GROUP BY ASSIGNEE;

SELECT CASE WHEN tba.WORK_TYPE = 'GROUPWORK' THEN '集团工作督办' WHEN tba.WORK_TYPE = 'CHAIRMAN' THEN '董事长督办' WHEN tba.WORK_TYPE = 'PRESIDENT' THEN '总裁督办' WHEN tba.WORK_TYPE = 'CONFERENCE' THEN '会议督办' WHEN tba.WORK_TYPE = 'ANNUALKEYWORK' THEN '年度重点工作督办' WHEN tba.WORK_TYPE = 'SPECIALWORK' THEN '专项工作督办' WHEN tba.WORK_TYPE = 'OFKEYDEPARTMENTS' THEN '部门重点工作督办' WHEN tba.WORK_TYPE = 'OTHER' THEN '其它督办' ELSE '' END AS SUPERVISION_WORK_TYPE, count(*) AS SUPERVISION_WORK_NUM FROM work_item AS tba, task_item AS tbb WHERE tba.WORK_ID = tbb.WORK_ID AND tbb.TASK_STATUS = 'urging' and tbb.ASSIGNEE = #{assignee} GROUP BY tba.WORK_TYPE

SELECT ASSIGNEE, sum(1) AS 'all', sum(CASE WHEN TASK_STATUS = 'open' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'open', sum(CASE WHEN TASK_STATUS = 'done' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'done', sum(CASE WHEN now() > TASK_DUEDATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'delay', sum(CASE WHEN TASK_STATUS = 'cancel' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'cancel' FROM task_item WHERE ASSIGNEE = #{assignee} GROUP BY ASSIGNEE;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task_item(TASK_ID, WORK_ID, WORK_TASK_NUM, ASSIGNEE_DEPT, ASSIGNEE, ASSIST, TASK_SUMMARY, TASK_DESCRIPTION, TASK_RESOLUTION, TASK_STATUS, TASK_CREATED, TASK_UPDATED, TASK_DUEDATE, REPORTER, SUPERVISOR) VALUES( #{taskId},#{workId},#{workTaskNum},#{assigneeDept},#{assignee},#{assist},#{taskSummary},#{taskDescription},#{taskResolution},#{taskStatus},#{taskCreated},#{taskUpdated},#{taskDuedate} ,#{reporter},#{supervisor});
mapper.update: UPDATE task_item SET ASSIGNEE_DEPT = #{assigneeDept}, ASSIGNEE = #{assignee}, ASSIST = #{assist}, TASK_SUMMARY = #{taskSummary}, TASK_DESCRIPTION = #{taskDescription}, TASK_DUEDATE = #{taskDuedate}, SUPERVISOR = #{supervisor} WHERE TASK_ID = #{taskId} and REPORTER = #{reporter}
